Raising/Training Methods
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Methods
This section is a place for comprehensive methods for raising and training monsters. For general tips and info on raising your monster, check out the Raising/Training Tips section.

In an effort to provide better, more consistent information, this section is closed to new posts.
If you have a new method, please read the thread:
Guidelines For New Methods Posts Required Reading
then post it in the Miscellaneous Q & A section.
If it has merit, and new content, moderators will move it here.
Please note that generally, we are not seeking new methods.
-Yet every n00b seems on insisiting on posting one!
Pretty much everything possible with drills and items has been explored extensively.
We are only seeking methods which introduce radical new usages.
